news.title: Starmer stamps authority with MP suspensions, but risks appearing vindictive
news.summary: Senior officials say the sackings came after repeated organising against the government.

news.title: US says 'specific steps' agreed to end Syria violence after Israeli strikes hit Damascus
news.summary: Israel says it is "working to save our Druze brothers", but Syria accuses it of "treacherous aggression".

news.title: New photo to mark Queen Camilla's 78th birthday
news.summary: The Queen is pictured smiling and looking relaxed in the new photo taken at her Wiltshire home, Raymill.

news.title: Labour MP Diane Abbott stands by racism comments
news.summary: The veteran Labour MP was disciplined by the party last year over comments in a newspaper letter.

news.title: Who are the Druze and why is Israel attacking Syria?

news.title: Harry follows in Diana's footsteps with landmine walk in Angola
news.summary: The Duke of Sussex visited a mine-clearing charity in Angola once supported by Princess Diana.

news.title: Lynagh to start for Australia in first Lions Test
news.summary: Fly-half Tom Lynagh will emulate his father, the Wallaby great Michael, when he starts for Australia in Saturday's first Test against the British and Irish Lions.

news.title: The race for a striker is hotting up - who is still available?
